columns.Decoration_Theme: The theme of decoration for the round.
columns.Member_ID: The unique identifier of each member participating.
columns.Round_ID: The unique identifier for each round of decoration.
columns.Rank_in_Round: The ranking of a member within a specific round.

columns.College_ID: The unique identifier for each college.
columns.Name: The name of the college.

columns.Country: The country where the member resides.
columns.College_ID: The unique identifier of the college associated with the member.
columns.Member_ID: The unique identifier for each member.
columns.Name: The name of the member.
